Pre-Game Insights: The Los Angeles Angels and the Texas Rangers will face off on September 8, 2024, at Globe Life Field.
Caden Dana will start for the Angels, while Andrew Heaney will start for the Rangers.
The betting odds for the game are Texas Rangers -170 / LA Angels +145, with an Over/Under of 8.5.
Others: The game will be broadcast on Bally Sports Southwest and Bally Sports West.
